title: adaseb
author: adaseb
content: I am new to DEX and Uniswap. I used it before for simple market price swaps however I am wondering is there anyway I can set limit orders whenever I want to sell something or buy something. Currently I would set alerts on Tradingview and then I would go to Uniswap and buy and sell at whatever price the market is trading at. However I am wondering if its possible to just use limit orders to buy and sell.

comments.author: logfiles
comments.body: It's possible, but not when swapping, and they are known as range orders.You can read through this ---> https://docs.uniswap.org/concepts/protocol/range-orders.This is a very short video, but it should give you an idea - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=WSQzAE77sFk
